description: Prisma is a database abstraction layer that turns your databases into GraphQL APIs with CRUD operations and realtime capabilities

environment.PRISMA_CONFIG:
managementApiSecret: $$cap_management_secret
port: 4466
databases:
  default:
    connector: mysql
    host: srv-captain--$$cap_appname-db
    port: 3306
    user: root
    password: $$cap_db_pass
    migrations: true

instructions.end: Prisma is deployed and available as $$cap_appname.
instructions.start: Prisma - Database tools for modern application development. This setup runs Prisma along with a MySQL Database.

variables.label: Prisma Version
variables.description: Check out their GitHub page for their latest version https://github.com/prisma/prisma

variables.label: MySQL Version
variables.description: Check out their Docker page for the valid tags https://hub.docker.com/r/library/mysql/tags/

variables.label: Prisma Management API secret
variables.description: To ensure only entitled users are able to perform actions through the Management API. Minimum 10 characters, at least one letter and one number.
